CanAccessCamera.description: Indicates whether this CspTrustedSite can access the user’s camera. The default value is false.

CanAccessMicrophone.description: Indicates whether this CspTrustedSite can access the user’s microphone. The default value is false.

Context.description: Declares the scope of the CSP directives for this trusted URL.

Description.description: The description of the trusted URL. Limit: 255 characters.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the trusted URL.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this CspTrustedSite is active.

IsApplicableToConnectSrc.description: Indicates whether Lightning components, third-party APIs, and WebSocket connections can load URLs using script interfaces from this trusted URL.

IsApplicableToFontSrc.description: Indicates whether Lightning components, third-party APIs, and WebSocket connections can load fonts from this trusted URL.

IsApplicableToFrameSrc.description: Indicates whether Lightning components, third-party APIs, and WebSocket connections can load resources contained in <iframe> elements from this trusted URL.

IsApplicableToImgSrc.description: Indicates whether Lightning components, third-party APIs, and WebSocket connections can load images from this trusted URL.

IsApplicableToMediaSrc.description: Indicates whether Lightning components, third-party APIs, and WebSocket connections can load audio and video from this trusted URL.

IsApplicableToStyleSrc.description: Indicates whether Lightning components can load style sheets from this trusted URL.

Language.description: The language for the trusted URL.

MasterLabel.description: Master label for this trusted URL.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix for this trusted URL.
